verses.verse: It happened on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

and he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H1241>a<s%> <S%H5695>calf<s%> from the herd for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> and <S%H7126>offer<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

You shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3947><s%> 'Take a <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%> and a <S%H5695>calf<s%> and a <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> both <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H8549>old,<s%> without blemish, for a burnt <S%H5930>offering;<s%>

and a <S%H7794>bull<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> for peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and a meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil:<s%> for <S%H3117>today<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> appears to <S%H7200>you.<s%>'"

They <S%H3947>brought<s%> what <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting:<s%> and all the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> drew <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> that you should <S%H6213>do:<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall appear to <S%H7200>you.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H7126>"Draw<s%> near to the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H6213>offer<s%> your sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and your burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H5971>yourself,<s%> and for the people; and <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H3068>them;<s%> as Yahweh <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>"
So <S%H175>Aaron<s%> drew near to the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H7819>killed<s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> which was for himself.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7126>presented<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> to <S%H2881>him;<s%> and he dipped his <S%H676>finger<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H3332>poured<s%> out the <S%H1818>blood<s%> at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar:<s%>

but the <S%H2459>fat,<s%> and the <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and the <S%H3508>cover<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H3516>liver<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> he <S%H6999>burned<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
The <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and the <S%H5785>skin<s%> he <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

He <S%H7819>killed<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H4672>delivered<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> to <S%H2236>him,<s%> and he sprinkled it <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
They <S%H4672>delivered<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> to <S%H5409>him,<s%> piece by piece, and the <S%H7218>head:<s%> and he <S%H6999>burned<s%> them upon the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
He <S%H7364>washed<s%> the <S%H7130>innards<s%> and the <S%H3767>legs,<s%> and <S%H6999>burned<s%> them on the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

He <S%H7126>presented<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>'s <S%H7133>offering,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> which was for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H2398>it,<s%> and offered it for sin, like the <S%H7223>first.<s%>
He <S%H7126>presented<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and <S%H6213>offered<s%> it according to the <S%H4941>ordinance.<s%>

He <S%H7126>presented<s%> the meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and <S%H4390>filled<s%> his <S%H3709>hand<s%> from <S%H6999>there,<s%> and burned it upon the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H905>besides<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

He also <S%H7819>killed<s%> the <S%H7794>bull<s%> and the <S%H352>ram,<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> which was for the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H4672>delivered<s%> to him the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> which he <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%>

and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H7794>bull<s%> and of the <S%H352>ram,<s%> the fat <S%H451>tail,<s%> and that which <S%H4374>covers<s%> the <S%H3629>innards,<s%> and the kidneys, and the <S%H3508>cover<s%> of the <S%H3516>liver:<s%>
and they <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> upon the <S%H2373>breasts,<s%> and he <S%H6999>burned<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%>

and the <S%H2373>breasts<s%> and the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>thigh<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5130>waved<s%> for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> toward the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3381>them;<s%> and he came down from <S%H6213>offering<s%> the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the burnt <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and came <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

There <S%H3318>came<s%> forth <S%H784>fire<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> and when all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H7442>it,<s%> they shouted, and <S%H5307>fell<s%> on their <S%H6440>faces.<s%>
